body.p: Which of the following statements is correct?

multiple_choice.choice: Although the data scientists will develop the models for an analytic solution, the client needs to understand the output of models as it will influence decisions.
A member of the business team might also have a data science background and can support the efforts of the data science team.
Collaboration is not encouraged as the data science project team owns the model development process.

feedback.p: Correct: The data science team will develop the model, but it is important for the client to understand the insights that can be gleaned from the models.
Incorrect: Collaboration is encouraged but model development should be done by the data science project team.
Incorrect: The model development process is collaborative.

body.p: One can make the argument for the transparency of a model. Which of the following statements would you consider as true:

multiple_choice.choice: The results of a model will influence decisions made by a client. If the results are not explainable, the client might make the wrong decision, therefore model transparency is important.
A transparent model will ensure that a business analyst can set the right analytic objectives for a data science project.
The results of the model can be interpreted by the client's data scientist or data analyst. That individual will interpret the model results to the client.

feedback.p: Correct: Explainability is important to both the project and client team!
Incorrect: The analytic objectives should be set before a model, method or task is developed or selected.
Incorrect: This answer assumes that your client has a data scientist on staff. The client should be educated (prior to model development) on what the results of the model entail.

body.p: An electricity supplier that has seen an increase in regulator penalties for incorrect estimates of energy consumption to their customers. Similar to other electricity suppliers, this client would like to deliver the right amount of power to the grid at the right time. The client needs accurate predictive models to guide its market operations and has partnered with an AI solutions provider to develop an analytic solution that improves the prediction of expected energy consumption.
During the analytic requirements definition process, the business analyst should consider:

multiple_choice.choice: Defining requirements for the predictive models, and the energy consumption data.
Defining requirements for the predictive models, the data is not the issue.
Defining requirements for a reporting mechanism as this is the main issue.

feedback.p: Correct: The analytic solution involves will consider data and model requirements.
Incorrect: If you believe that models will be fit to the data, then you should consider defining requirements for your data as well.
Incorrect: Reread the scenario, the objective identified does not indicate that there is an issue with reporting.
